biotools.summary: Reconstructing high-resolution image datasets of cleared and expanded samples | ImgLib2/BDV implementation of Stitching for large datasets | The BigStitcher is a software package that allows simple and efficient alignment of multi-tile and multi-angle image datasets, for example acquired by lightsheet, widefield or confocal microscopes. The software supports images of almost arbitrary size ranging from very small images up to volumes in the range of many terabytes, which are for example produced when acquiring cleared tissue samples with lightsheet microscopy
